title: Garden Smart
overview: This instructional series hosted by plantsman Eric Johnson provides viewers with practical gardening advice. The show, described as a ``hands in the dirt'' experience, addresses topics that are varied, timely and cutting edge. Each week, an expert horticulturist provides gardening insight from fantastic gardening locations across the United States. Each weekly episode follows the growing season, allowing the information presented to be pertinent and helpful the same day an episode airs.
